author: John Peterson
comment: Pink line of death appeared on my s7 edge. Googled about it; saw a lot of people saying it is an unfixable hardware problem and the phone would have to be returned. But I came across this app and gave it a go.  I saw some people say it needs hours to work. I let it run fo literally only a minute. I was going to set my phone down and let it run longer but I just wanted to check one more thing online. The line was already gone and my screen was normal again. Awesome. Try this at least before you return your phone.

author: Amy Argona
comment: Amazing! I was so upset when my new Galaxy S8+ had a thin green line down the screen. Ran this app for less than a minute and the line is gone! So glad I didn't waste my time trying to return the phone or get it repaired.

author: Reiner Anonymous
comment: I was skeptical at the beginning that it could fix the pink line on my s7 edge. And it FIXED the problem! I was blown away! Thank you so very much for this app. I'm donating so that you could make more apps that can help people. Thank you again.
I had one pixel that was red. It could turn white, but otherwise it was stuck on red. Restarting the device didn't help, but this app did. Thanks sooooo much. 5 stars

author: Thiago Silva
comment: I have tried everything to fix the pink line on my s7 edge display for months now. I stumbled upon this on YouTube and it worked on the first try. Thank you so much devs, you just saved me $250 on a new display.

author: Mihai Daniel
comment: Your app is very efficient. I had a line of red coloured and it rising . I own a Samsung galaxy s7, everything is great but the evening it appeared suddenly with drop in concrete ot other parts, it made a little bath in energy drink accidentally. I made the donation in you app  I  have warranty, but staying without a phone sucks. Enough with this",novel', I think you did  the best app for its category, simple and efficient. Good luck and keep up the good !

author: Bombastus
comment: It's stupid that people dislike this just because it doesn't work for them, you did it way better than another apps that promise to do the same. I downloaded an app that uses black and white noise where the ratio is 16:9 a ratio for such an app should be the phones ratio. You did the best possible software fix yet this other app has a better rating just because they don't understand how this works
